typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_key as string,
		prl_type_code_desc as string,
		prl_ri_vessel_type as string,
		paris_ipapcode as string,
		prl_text as string,
		prl_main_cover_limit_usd as decimal(28,10),
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		last_updated_by as string,
		prl_period_from as date,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		prl_reason as string,
		prl_sub_limit_ind as string,
		prl_period_to as date,
		prl_premium_days as short,
		prl_pro_rata_ind as string,
		prl_add_cover_limit_usd as decimal(28,10),
		prl_premium_basis as decimal(28,10),
		prl_type_code as string,
		inserted_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select prl_period_to,	prl_premium_basis,\nprl_text,\nprl_sub_limit_ind,\nprl_pro_rata_ind,\nprl_key,\nprl_type_code_desc,\nprl_period_from,\nprl_reason,\nprl_type_code,\nprl_ri_vessel_type,	prl_add_cover_limit_usd,	prl_main_cover_limit_usd,	prl_paris_ipacode,\nprl_premium_days,\nfrom dwh_prepare.pre_dim_premium_line',
	format: 'query') ~> PreDimPremiumLine
Select1 derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Premium Lines') ~> PremiumLineTopLevel
PremiumLineTopLevel aggregate(groupBy(pk_key),
	each(match(name != 'pk_key'), $$ = max($$))) ~> GetDistinctRows
PreDimPremiumLine select(mapColumn(
		pk_key,
		prl_type_code_desc,
		prl_ri_vessel_type,
		paris_ipapcode,
		prl_text,
		prl_main_cover_limit_usd,
		date_last_updated,
		last_updated_by,
		prl_period_from,
		date_inserted,
		prl_reason,
		prl_sub_limit_ind,
		prl_period_to,
		prl_premium_days,
		prl_pro_rata_ind,
		prl_add_cover_limit_usd,
		prl_premium_basis,
		prl_type_code,
		inserted_by
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
